casebody.data:
Submitted on record and briefs August 31, affirmed December 26,2007 STATE OF OREGON, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. MATHEW SMITH THOMPSON, Defendant-Appellant.

Clackamas County Circuit Court

CR0411844; A126145 174 P3d 1114 Peter Ozanne, Executive Director, Peter Gartlan, Chief Defender, Legal Services Division, and Stephanie Hortsch, Deputy Public Defender, Office of Public Defense Services, filed the briefs for appellant. Hardy Myers, Attorney General, Mary H. Williams, Solicitor General, and Laura S. Anderson, Senior Assistant Attorney General, filed the brief for respondent. Before Brewer, Chief Judge, and Ortega, Judge, and Deits, Judge pro tempore. PER CURIAM

Affirmed. State v. Rodriguez, 217 Or App 24, 175 P3d 471 (2007).
